definition: kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment

sentences.english: Moreover, 6 patients su ered from redislocation, and 23 patients experienced patella instability.
sentences.chinese: 術後6例發生再脫位，23例出現單純髕骨不穩。

sentences.english: Patella resurfacing has no effect on the reduction of patellar tendon.
sentences.chinese: 置換髕骨對髕腱短縮沒有影響。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of massage manipulation on chondromalacia patellae.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察手法治療髕骨軟化症的效果。

sentences.english: Objective: To study an internal fixation method for patella fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的一種治療髕骨骨折的內固定方法。

sentences.english: Sports injury is the important cause of chondromalacia patella.
sentences.chinese: 運動創傷是髕骨軟骨軟化症發生的重要原因。

sentences.english: Objective: To study clinical value and method the treatment of the patella fractures by arthroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討關節鏡在髕骨骨折治療中應用的方法和價值。

sentences.english: Satisfying axial view patella was acquired on both of the two kinds of cases, with an eligible rate of 97 %.
sentences.chinese: 兩者均可獲得滿意的髕骨軸位影像，優良率達97%。

sentences.english: This paper presents the preliminary investigation on chondromalacia patella at our department in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 總結近年來我科對髕骨軟化症研究的初步結果。

sentences.english: Objective To study a new internal fixation method for the treatment of patellar fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究一種治療髕骨骨折的新的內固定方法。

sentences.english: Then, the form and area of the patellar and tibial medial condylar articular surface were measured in 30 cases.
sentences.chinese: 觀測30塊髕骨和脛骨內側髁上關節面的形態和麪積。

sentences.english: The subjects of femoral trochlear dysplasia and medial subluxation of the patella are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 受試者股骨滑車發育不良和內側脫位髕骨簡要討論。

sentences.english: Therapeutic transverse patellar fracture type separation using tension-band wire fixation.
sentences.chinese: 治療上橫斷分離型髕骨骨折，採用張力帶鋼絲內固定。

sentences.english: No instances of patellar or trochlear loosening were identified.
sentences.chinese: 沒有確定的髕骨或滑車鬆動的實例。

sentences.english: Patellar tracking is affected by a combination of static and dynamic factors.
sentences.chinese: 髕骨的運行軌跡受到靜態的和動態的多重因素的影響。

sentences.english: Conclusion Massage manipulation is an effective method to treat chondromalacia patellae.
sentences.chinese: 結論手法是治療髕骨軟化症的有效方法。

sentences.english: To observe the cure effect of needle-knife together with oral taking traditional Chinese drug(TCD)and functional exercise on patella malacia.
sentences.chinese: 觀察針刀中藥內服配合功能鍛鍊治療髕骨軟化症療效。
